duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide an elevated and seamless customer experience through expert skills in beauty knowledge, virtual selling, service & recovery.
Drive and exceed sales goals by providing a personalized beauty experience based on individual customer needs.
Leverage MyClient to nurture client relationships through impactful and personalized outreach.
Participate in pre-selling and sales driving events, remain up to date with all training through Beauty Playground.
Partner with Counter Manager and CSX Manager to identify business-driving opportunities.
Ensure timely processing of new receipts, damages, testers, and return to vendors (RTVs). Upkeep a clean, safe, and inviting environment in alignment with company standards & guidelines.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent required.
